title: The "Pro-Israel" Smear Campaign to Cancel a Global Charity
description:
The terrorism allegations were false, but the nonprofit still lost access to banking and financial tools.

The post The “Pro-Israel” Smear Campaign to Cancel a Global Charity appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Oregon Domestic Terrorism Law Targets the Far Right. Here’s How It’ll Backfire.
description:
The Democrat-sponsored bill has broad bipartisan support, but civil rights groups say it’s open to misuse against climate and racial justice activists.

The post Oregon Domestic Terrorism Law Targets the Far Right. Here’s How It’ll Backfire. appeared first on The Intercept.
